Render:AddText.description: Draws a Text with optionals Shadow and Outline

Render:Project.description: Transforms a 3D world-space vector into 2D screen coordinates.

Render:Deproject.description:
Transforms a 2D screen coordinates into 3D world-space location.
Returns {'Position', 'Direction'}

Render:ClearItems.description: Remove all drawing of using that specific group_id

Render:GetViewportSize.description: Returns the size of viewport (how much screen space the game window occupies)

Render:SubscribeViewportResized.description: Called when the screen is resized
